channel.title: Someone help a newb
channel.description:
I would really like to make a RSC server. I have been playing since 01 and I love the game. I have designed my dream server and I want to make it. PLEASE can someone point me in the right direction to getting started? I have been searching forums and google for hours and everything I find is extremely old. Can anyone help me out?
tersch87@gmail.com
Thank you very much for reading.

item.description:
